texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Mm... H-Huh?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Good morning.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Uh, where's Yonagi?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Still sleeping.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Oh, I see.
I glance at the bed on the other side of the room. Yonagi's still lying there, breathing quiet and even.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: What's wrong?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Hm?

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: I thought we were having the same dream.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: That is correct.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: But now, she has started having a different dream.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Different?
Izumo nods.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Your memory needs to be initialized.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: What do you mean?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: You are the receptor for her dream world. Any past memories you have will only become noise.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: You're erasing my memories again?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: That's right.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Wait a second. You can't just do this.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: I don't even remember anything from before two days ago.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: I am sorry. I have already received the pertinent permission from the concerned party regarding the initialization process in the event of an error such as this.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: You mean... me?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: You when you had your whole memory, to be exact.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Wait! Even if I'm going to lose the memories anyway, I still want to know what happened.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Weren't you managing the dreams and sequencing them like a story?

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: I'm still halfway through a dream. Why is this happening out of nowhere?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: It is Yonagi who decides the contents of the dream. You receive the images from her, and your reactions return to Yonagi.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: To progress the dream requires interaction between the two of you. But now there is a gap between you and her dream world.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: What caused it?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Unknown.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: What happens if I don't want to do this? Do you really need to erase my memories to resolve this situation?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Literally nothing will happen.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: You will remain in this facility, unable to leave, and Yonagi will keep on dreaming without waking up.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: What?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: The only thing that can advance her dream is the interactions between you and her.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Unless there is a reaction signal from the receptor, Yonagi will keep on sending the same signal in hopes of getting a response.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: It would mean that the goal of this plan would not be achieved. Therefore, nothing would happen.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: She'd keep sleeping? Goal of the plan?
I turn to Yonagi once more.
Her chest is moving up and down faintly.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: To recover Yonagi's ego. That is the goal of this plan.
I asked her before what all this was for.
Yesterday, she denied me that information.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: You didn't tell me that yesterday. Why now?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Because the initialization has already been decided.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: You don't have to do anything. Just fall asleep.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Wooleep will perform a selective memory cleaning on you. There will be no pain. When you wake again, you won't remember this conversation happened.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Wha... Nnh...
Suddenly, speaking becomes hard.
My eyelids feel like they're made out of lead.
My mind dims, and my vision narrows.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: W-Wait...

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: H-How many times...

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Have I... lost my... memories...

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: This is the first time.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Rest well, Kaito.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Nnh... H-Huh?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Good morning.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Uh, where's Yonagi?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: She's already awake.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Oh, I see.
I've gotten accustomed to waking up to Yonagi peering into my face.
But today I'm met with the ceiling.
It makes me feel slightly sad.
I stare at her empty bed for a moment.
When I raise my face, I meet Izumo's eyes as she looks down at me.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: I believe she went out to the rooftop.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Huh? Really?
She nods.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: But didn't she say she doesn't like being out there?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: She's changing, little by little.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: I see.
That person in the dream resembles her.
The things that happen as the dream progresses are changing her.
I've started to get a vague sense of what this experiment is about.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: I want to see her.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Can I?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Of course.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Let's go to the rooftop.
I rise from the bed and put on my sandals.
When the elevator doors open and I step out onto the rooftop, I see Yonagi's back.
Wooleep is hovering behind her.
She's just looking at the sky.
I chase her gaze with mine.
I look up at the round, starry sky.
It feels so close you could reach out and touch it, but not quite.
The surface and the wind are so near, yet so far.
Wild greenery spreads out beyond the circular lens.
I look turn my gaze back down to Yonagi.
Noticing my approaching footsteps, she turns around.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Ah...

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Good morning.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Good morning?
I stand next to her, resting my elbows on the railing.
She watches me attentively.
Then she grabs me by the cheeks and turns my face towards hers.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Ngh...

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Kaito.
I nod, still sandwiched between her hands.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Kaito.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: That's me.
She nods.
Finally, she slowly peels her hands away from my cheeks.

texts.name: Shleep
texts.text: *Chirp*

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Do you recognize me?
Yonagi shakes her head.
Then she raises her hand and points at my face.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Kaito.
Then she points at herself.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Yonagi.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: That's it.
I answer her with a nod.

texts.name: Shleep
texts.text: *Chirp*

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: What are you doing out here?

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Looking at the sky.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Aren't you cold?

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: A little.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: The air isn't that good out here. Maybe we should go inside.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: But I want to look at the sky.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: I wanted to make sure it was there.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: ...I'm hungry.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Would you like to eat?

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Yes.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: I'm thirsty.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Let's go inside.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Not yet. I need to talk to you, Izumo.
Izumo gives me a level stare.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Wooleep, with Yonagi.

texts.name: Shleep
texts.text: *Affirmative chirp*
Wooleep hovers ahead of Yonagi to guide her.
She follows after the little floating robot back to the elevator.
Once the door closes, we're the only ones left on the rooftop.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: She's changed.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Yes.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Does it have something to do with the dream I'm having?

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Otherwise, you wouldn't need to bother monitoring my dreams.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: The only one who changes each time I wake up is Yonagi.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: You don't need to answer.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: In fact, I feel like your silence is an answer in and of itself.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: What do you mean?

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: If I wasn't close to the truth, you would deny what I'm saying.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: There's only one thing I want to ask.
I stare at her face.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: If I keep dreaming, will you be able to help that girl?

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Is this experiment being done for Yonagi's sake?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Yes.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: It will save her.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: What's wrong with her?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: I cannot answer that question right now.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Did I know, before I lost my memory?
She nods.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: I see... So that must mean...

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: I agreed to help with this experiment because I wanted to help her.
She keeps her steady, neutral gaze on me.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: And even as I am now, I want to see her grow.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: But...

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: How many times have we repeated this exchange?

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: How many times have I had my memories wiped and kept dreaming?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: We have only cleaned your memory once.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: ...Not like I have much choice but to believe whatever you tell me.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: You said it yourself. You can lie if you need to.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: I have no choice but to believe.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: But you're the one who said that an actual liar would never admit to being one.
The comment rips a chuckle out of me.
I detect a hint of bewilderment in Izumo.
Or perhaps I'm just imagining things again.
Perhaps I'm just seeing what I want to see, attributing emotions where there are none.
Rin's memory lingers in my mind.
That sorrowful wail of hers...
I'm sure it's as much Yonagi's sadness as it is Rin's.
In both this world—
And the dream world—
I'm the only one who can save her.
I clench my fists, a mixture of frustration and helplessness filling my being.
Olivia's memory lingers in my mind.
That confident smile of hers.
I'm sure it's as much Yonagi's confidence as it is Olivia's.
In both this world—
And the dream world—
I'm the only one who can be by her side.
I'm the only one who can fulfill her unreasonable demands.
I clench my fists, a mixture of frustration and determination filling my being.
Sumomo's memory lingers in my mind.
That joyful smile of hers.
I'm certain that it's as much Yonagi's happiness as it is Sumomo's.
In both this world—
And the dream world—
I'm the only one who can bring out that smile.
I'm sure Yonagi's smile can be as dazzling as Sumomo's.
I clench my fists, a mixture of determination and conviction filling my being.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: There are still many things I don't understand.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: But I've decided what it is I want to get back first.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: What is that?
Izumo stares at me, her tone as monotonous as ever.
I watch her staring at me from the corner of my eye.
A faint smile touches my lips.
Little by little, I'm coming to like this aloof girl.
Perhaps...
Perhaps, even after being wiped so many times, the faint traces of my memories are starting to coalesce within me.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: When that time comes, you'll understand.
I use the same phrase she said to me once before and smile at her.
She simply stares at my profile as I look up at the night sky, her expression unfazed.
The stars twinkle in the distant sky.
I wonder if the night breeze blows beyond the lens separating us from it.
I wonder...
Does Yonagi imagine that wind enveloping us as well? What goes through her mind?

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Let's go back.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Inside?
I shake my head.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: To Yonagi's dream.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: All of Yonagi's dreams...

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Huh?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: They have progressed beyond what was planned for. If we transmit the mapping data we have saved from her brain, you can continue whichever dream you want.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Uh, mapping data?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Wooleep has been recording the sensory signals in her brain.
So we can nudge her towards a particular dream by stimulating the parts of her brain that activate during each of them.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: And you have the data for all the dreams. Three of them, right?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Yes.
I smile again.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Hm?

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: I only remember one of those dreams.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: But Wooleep has the data for all three of them, right?
She gives me a small nod.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: How strange. Who dreamed those other two with her?
She stares at me in complete silence.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Never mind. Just tell me one thing: Is this the first time this experiment has come this far?

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Or have we had this conversation more than once?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: This is the first time all of Yonagi's dreams have progressed further than our control values. The plan is progressing.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: I see.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: And I can believe it when you say that?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: From now on, your memory will not be initialized.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: You can trust my words.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: ...Well, I suppose I'll have to.
In other words, they have initialized my memory several times in the past.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: So, how do I choose the dream?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Just tell me which one you want to continue. Which dream would you like to see?
